title: Kalhu Archive 13
description: In Room 8 (the throne room) of the Burnt Palace, as well as in adjoining rooms, British excavators found letters addressed to and from the eighth-century-BC Assyrian king Sargon II (721–705 BC).

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Kalhu on the basis of Pedersén 1987 Plan 68.
properties.title: Plan location of Kalhu Archive 13
